!Example heading
!!bold and italics stuff Here's some __bold text__ and now "some italic text I hope ". Not sure about italics though.
!!bullets * first bulleted item * second bulleted item
!!numbered lists # number list point 1 ## is that 1.1? ### is that 1.1.1? # this is point 2 # and point 3
